//: Ensure these items are synced across projects

scripts.test_yarn: npm run yarn2 && npm test && npm run fix
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage_test && npm run coverage_report
scripts.commit: npm run fix && git add . && git commit -a -m "config updates"
scripts.commitAll: npm run yarn2 && npm run fix && npm run commit && npm test && npm run push
scripts.commitFast: npm run commit && npm run push && git status && npm run line
scripts.pull: git pull && npm run yarnfast && npm test && npm run line
scripts.gitfix: git rm -r --cached . && git add . && git commit -m ".gitignore fix"
scripts.push: echo Push and release patch to master... && echo ------------------------------ && git push origin master
scripts.prep: npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch
scripts.release: npm run fix && npm test && npm run patch && start npm run push
scripts.beta: npm run commit && npm run release
scripts.upgrade: npm run ncu && npm run commit && npm run release && npm run line
scripts.install: yarn global add babel-eslint codecov mocha nyc snazzy standard
